definition: to throw/to toss/to fling/to cast/to abandon
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to dump (selling abroad more cheaply than cost price at home)
to throw out/to get rid of
to drop anchor/to break down (of a car etc)
to throw down/to dump/to abandon/thrown down
to show your face in public (derog.)
lit. throw out a brick and get jade thrown back (idiom)/fig. to attract others' interest or suggestions by putting forward one's own modest ideas to get the ball rolling

sentences.english: She has made so many passes at me recently that I think it necessary to freeze her off.
sentences.chinese: 最近她多次向我拋送秋波，我覺得有必要疏遠她。

sentences.english: Let's flip a coin to decide who should go first - do you want heads or tails?
sentences.chinese: 我們來拋硬幣決定誰先走吧，你是要正面還是要反面？

sentences.english: No wonder we feel good and depression is left in the dust.
sentences.chinese: 難怪我們感覺良好，抑鬱被拋於九天雲外。

sentences.english: He threw his homework aside and watched TV.
sentences.chinese: 他把家庭作業拋到一邊去看電視了。

sentences.english: Joking aside I want to reassure you that I am invited here tonight.
sentences.chinese: 拋開玩笑，我襄蜇申今晚我的確是受邀而來的。

sentences.english: Operational recommendations, the space continues to hold, near MA5 short throw.
sentences.chinese: 操作建議，空單繼續持有，MA5附近短拋。

sentences.english: That year, the easy man thrown, red cherry, green banana.
sentences.chinese: 那一年，流光容易把人拋，紅了櫻桃，綠了芭蕉。

sentences.english: You don't want to bet the farm on a coin-toss.
sentences.chinese: 你不會希望通過拋硬幣來賭上農場。

sentences.english: Dozens of ships were washed ashore and more dozens were buried at the bottom of the sea.
sentences.chinese: 幾十艘船被拋上海灘，更多的船隻則葬身海底。

sentences.english: In absconding more by accident Japanese girl Beijing child cast fall the sea, beijing child oath signs up for this enemy.
sentences.chinese: 逃亡中更誤將日本少女京子拋落海，京子誓報此仇。

sentences.english: Chandler: With the balled-up socks? I figured you taught him that.
sentences.chinese: 拋襪子捲成的球啊，我以爲是你教他的。

sentences.english: Will let like in making the new future, all will throw outside sadly beyond the highest heavens.
sentences.chinese: 讓愛就在打造新的未來，一切憂傷拋九霄雲外。

sentences.english: Life i value highly, for love, i can give up life, for freedom, i can give up both.
sentences.chinese: 生命誠可貴，愛情價更高，若爲自由身，兩者皆可拋。

sentences.english: Some enthusiasts of the sport say that results in longer, smoother casts.
sentences.chinese: 一些運動愛好者說，這使魚鉤可以拋得更遠更順利。

sentences.english: This paper summarizes the research work done to grind and polish rustless steel pipe.
sentences.chinese: 本文總結了砂帶磨拋不鏽鋼管的研究工作。

sentences.english: When it was finally within reach he caught hold of it and tossed it up onto the road.
sentences.chinese: 當最終夠得着時他抓住它，向上拋到路上。

definition: the back of the head/(fig.) the back of one's mind
to raise one's head/to perk up
to overturn/to collapse/to lean/to tend/to incline/to pour out
to save or redeem (a situation)/to mediate/to intercede
to wash/to squander/to sweep away/to move/to shake/dissolute/pond
to start over/to do sth all over again
